string.name: homeTab
string.comment: The tab in bottom navigation bar. Must be very short (10 characters max) to avoid ugly text shifting issues.

string.name: deleteLocalDatabase
string.comment: The button in settings screen to delete local database. Also the confirm title that is displayed on a confirm dialog to confirm the action of deleting it.
